org.bson

Class BSONWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bson.BSONWriter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BSONBinaryWriter

    public abstract class BSONWriter
extends Object
implements Closeable
    Represents a BSON writer for some external format (see subclasses).
    Since:
    3.0.0
